title: XP boost not working
body:
Yesterday I purchased a 3-day XP boost, but it was only till today that I realised I was not receiving any bonus XP after every match. I had just finished playing Co-op vs. AI - Beginner at the time of discovery, and I played Co-op vs. AI - Intermediate and a Normal - Blind Pick match to make sure this bug wasn't isolated to Co-op vs. AI. 

The image linked shows my current match history played today and the XP gains, which appear to be normal. No bonus whatsoever.

replies.body:
It's a time-based XP boost, not a per-win boost.

And yeah, I'll go submit a ticket.

How did it turn out?

Also, use the "Reply" feature next time.

How does one have an XP boost when there are no more wins available? I suggest making a support ticket to see if you can get that XP reimbursed, or at least your unused RP back.

Do you have the transaction details?
